Remarks: Six provinces can be added here to the known distribution records of
H. sinuatus
. In determining this species, attention must be paid to possible confusion with
H. soror
.
H. sinuatus
is a common species found both in warmer ( Bursa , Mersin ) and cooler regions ( Erzurum , Hakkâri ). The flight period is from May to the end of August. Visits were observed to flowers of
Daucus carota
,
Melilotus officinalis
,
Onobrychis viciifolia
and
Salix sp.
The species is frequently recorded in Turkey (20 provinces).

Distribution: All of Europe, Russia , Azerbaijan , Georgia , Cyprus , Iran . Turkey : Amasya , Ankara , Balıkesir , Bilecik , Bursa , Denizli , Hatay , İstanbul , Konya , Kütahya , Mardin , Nevşehir , Şanlıurfa ( WARNCKE 1972 ); Kars ( ÖZBEK 1977 ); Aksaray , Artvin , Erzurum , Hakkâri , Mersin and Sivas .
